citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on
14-Nov-17.The inspector waited at the facility for a half hour and no one was available to allow an inspection.
Inspections of facilities and animals are required to ensure the well-being of animals licensed under the Animal
Welfare Act,
Contact the inspector by November 28, 2017 to provide times and dates when someone will be available to allow an
inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on
14-Nov-17.The inspector waited at the facility for a half hour and no one was available to allow an inspection.
Inspections of facilities and animals are required to ensure the well-being of animals licensed under the Animal

Contact the inspector by November 28, 2017 to provide times and dates when someone will be available to allow an
inspection.
